channel.title: Need help with digital camera
channel.description: i recently got a PHILIPS keychain digital camera and i took some photos but, my computer said it was missing some dll files so i added them and now i want to reinstall the driver for the camera since i got the files.... how do u fully uninstall the camera?

item.title: Need help with digital camera

item.title: Need help with digital camera
item.dc:creator: @runes_war runes war
item.description:
@runes_war wrote:

lol not that kind of video camera i got a digital picture camera and it aint installed into any walls or anything its in my pocket rite now

oh and aint it under hardware and not system management

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with digital camera
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

[quote=“jcs_double, post:2, topic:2958”]go to my computer and right click it (start menu or desktop) and select properties. select the tab system management (i think) and click on device manager. and then find where cameras are and and expand it and right click it and select delete

there you go[/quote]

Yeah, that would be right, if he asked how to uninstall the camera software. Too bad he asked:

how do u fully uninstall the camera?

The answer to that question, of course, is another question. Where have you installed the camera? If the answer is in the girls locker room at your local public highschool, then the answer is, at night in dark clothes.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with digital camera
item.dc:creator: @jcs_double jcs_double
item.description:
@jcs_double wrote:

go to my computer and right click it (start menu or desktop) and select properties. select the tab system management (i think) and click on device manager. and then find where cameras are and and expand it and right click it and select delete

there you go

Read full topic
